spec_data.Name: mona-sazanami-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Mona Font is a Japanese proportional font which allows you to view
Japanese text arts correctly.

This package contains True Type fonts generated generated from
monafont source package which are based on Sazanami fonts.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 23 Feb 2017 06:37:25 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: True Type Japanese font for text arts based on Sazanami
